column5: Got out today for a few hours as the weather was nice, and was done work early for change so i had nothing better to do then to try some luck at my fav hole, spent a good hour bringing in small perch and rock bass. i changed my bait from plain old worm and weight to a floating Dancer popper which proved successful!! i had no scale,measuring tape or camera as i came from work with a small amount of tackle, but luckily for me, there was another fella fishing who did have a camera...here she is... this guy was even nice enuff to send me the picture today!! thank you kindly and it is well appreciated!!  all in all, i had a very good day.... Bud
Very nice Bud!!!  Great way to end the day....you'll have to try to get of work early more often  .  Very nice of the gentleman to take your picture and e-mail it to you as well.  Maureen

Very nice fish and kind of the person to help you out!  I caught a "legal" Sailfish down in Florida a few months back on one of the party boats.  Naturally, had no camera with me but a guy on the boat took some pics...never sent them. Nuts.
Nicely done Joe! Thats one solid looking bass. And I see that your back on that " boardwalk " again - sure has been good for you!    Don
